title: Understanding VLOOKUP
text: VLOOKUP is a function in Excel used to search for a value in the first column of a table and return a value in the same row from a specified column.

title: Table Orientation
text: Consider the orientation of your data table. Is it organized vertically or horizontally?

hintAnswer: when the table direction is vertical
title: Identify Table Direction
text: What is the direction of the table when using VLOOKUP?
choices: when the table direction for a field of data is $$\frac{horizontal}{across}$$ the worksheet
when the table direction is vertical
